actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: A resolution to express the sense of the House of Representatives that Aaron Stern be commended for his scientific contributions and hope that the fruits of his life-long labor receive the recognition they merit.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the House of Representatives that Aaron Stern be commended for his scientific contributions and the hope that the fruits of his life-long labor receive the recognition they merit.

titles.title: A resolution to express the sense of the House of Representatives that Aaron Stern be commended for his scientific contributions and hope that the fruits of his life-long labor receive the recognition they merit.
